vocabulary.question: der Kopf
vocabulary.answer:
head

Mein Kopf tut weh.
My head hurts.

vocabulary.question: die Hand
vocabulary.answer:
hand

Ich wasche meine Hände.
I wash my hands.

vocabulary.question: das Brot
vocabulary.answer:
bread

Ich esse Brot zum Frühstück.
I eat bread for breakfast.

grammar.question: What is the accusative form of 'der'?
What is the dative form of 'die' (singular)?
